jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced PICC RN for a 13-week travel contract.  The Vascular Access / PICC Line Nurse (RN) is responsible for inserting peripherally inserted central catheters (PICC) into patients, while safely using ultrasound and other radiological imaging as needed to ensure proper placement and safe delivery of medicine to patient. The PICC RN will also monitor vascular access device on a daily basis, educate nursing staff on PICC line placement, and discuss risk and purpose of PICC with patient.  1+ year of recent PICC RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
